summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying the root cause and providing logical reasoning. However, it could improve by capturing the full causal chain and providing more detailed actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM activity as the root cause of the VCORE level increase.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM to VCORE link but missed the complete chain involving CPU and DDR.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages but missed some CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more detailed.
